mdRecord.dcterms:title: Dr. LeGear's Live Stock Manual
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The cover of this pamphlet reads "Dr. LeGear's Live Stock Manual - A Practical Guide - Treatment and Care of Cows, Sheep, Hogs and Horses" by Dr. L.D. LeGear Medicine Co. St Louis MO. U.S.A. The pamphlet has sections for each animal detailing a variety of ailments along with the appropriate Dr. LeGear's product, such as "Flatulent Colic Medicine" for Bloated Cows. This booklet was distributed by Fred J. Agnew, General Merchandiser in Floyd, VA.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Advertising
